alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 01 at 3:47PM EDT until October 02 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to 1 to 3 feet of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas in North Topsail Beach, along the lower New River, White Oak River, Bogue and Core Sounds, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Up to 1 to 3 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in a low threat of property damage. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes adjacent to the waterfront will experience shallow flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Beaufort Marine Lab NC MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 5.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor -0.8 ft, Moderate -0.3 ft, Major 0.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/11 PM 4.6 -1.2 1.3 1 None 02/11 AM 5.4 -0.4 1.3 1 Minor 02/11 PM 4.3 -1.5 1.2 1 None 03/12 PM 5.1 -0.7 1.2 1 Minor 04/12 AM 3.9 -1.9 1.1 1 None 04/01 PM 4.6 -1.2 0.9 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; West Carteret
